name: Discord - Hide button for gifting Nitro v0.1
description:
Hide button on the right side of chat input for gifting Nitro.

Future versions might make it possible for you to turn off additional buttons.

For now you can see my other style "Discord - Hide button for stickers v0.1" to hide the "Open sticker picker" button. :)
additional_info:
21. jan 2022
v0.1 - Published version that hides "Gift nitro" button in chats. Tested on Chromium on Windows desktop.
